Convention Safari Hotel - Scottsdale, ArizonaSEPTEMBER 16, 17, 18Enclosed shopping area I Holiday and Motel 6 nearby, within walking distance.Tentative ScheduleFri., Sept. 16 - Commercial Displays open noon. Cocktail Party - evening.Sat., Sept. 17 - Outstanding speakers throughout day. Cocktail Party,banquet, awards - evening.Sun., Sept. 18 - All day tour to visit 3 locations: Phoenix Zoo, BernardHoer's Collection, and Mickey Ollson Farms (2 locations).HOTEL RATES - $20.00 single room per night $24.00 Double room per nightTICKET COST - $35.00 per person - to attend for three days - which includes lectures, the Sunday Bus Tour, and four meals (2 lunches - 1 Saturday, and 1 Sunday, Banquet on Saturday night, Breakfast on Sunday).PLAN TO ATTENDIf you're interested in birds - you can't buy a more entertaining, exciting, educational weekend.Be sure to save yourself money by using the Pre-Registration form attached herein..1 .... > ,< Ir ~I // I\ A.F.A.~~--, ANNUAL RAFFLE v. 1- \V UNIQUE FANTASTIC OUTSTANDING SUPER COLOSSALDrawing DateSaturday, September 17, 1977Safari HotelScottsdale, ArizonaI1978 Chevrolet Chevette One Pair American Singer CanariesOne Pair Umbrella Cockatoos One Pair Shaftail FinchesOne Pair Rozellas One Pair Albino CockatielsOne Pair Good Mutation Lovebirds One Pair Peach Face LovebirdsOne Pair Bourke Grass Parakeets One Pair Peach Face LovebirdsOne Pair Pearl Cockatiels One Pair English ParakeetsOne Pair Blue Peach Face Lovebirds One Pair Blue Eared PheasantsOne Book - Finches & Soft Billed Birds One Pair Nanday Conures(Autographed by Author) Bob Busenbark One Orange Winged Amazon ParrotOne Black Swan One Pair Half Moon Conures - Breeding PairOne Amazon Parrot One Orange Winged Amazon ParrotOne Pair Pheasants One Pair Border CanariesDONATIONS $1.00 for each ticket or $25.00 for 30 ticketsFor additional tickets and information contact:Joe de Aguiar, National Raffle Chairman - A.F .A.\ .
